message: Dear User your account has been compromised. Immediate action is required! Click the link below to secure your account before it's permanently disabled.
Attention! Your payment failed and your account will be suspended in 24 hours. Update your payment information here: [suspicious link].
We noticed unusual activity in your bank account. Please confirm your identity immediately to prevent loss of funds: [link].
This is PayPal. You must confirm your account information to avoid suspension. Please enter your details at the following link: [phishing link].
Hello I am from your IT department. We need to update your credentials in the system. Kindly reply with your username and password to proceed.
This is your HR manager. Please fill out the attached form with your personal information to avoid losing your upcoming payment.
Congratulations! You've won a $500 Amazon Gift Card! Just confirm your details at the link below to claim your prize.
You have an unclaimed reward from your online shopping! Please click here to get it: [suspicious link].
We have a fantastic investment opportunity with guaranteed returns. Reply with your banking details to get started!
Hi I'm your colleague John. I'm locked out of my account and urgently need you to transfer $1 000 to this client while I resolve it. I’ll pay you back later.
This is your boss and I'm traveling right now. I need you to buy some gift cards for a client meeting urgently. Send the codes to me once purchased.
My car broke down on my way to meet a client and I need your help to pay for towing services. I'll reimburse you. Please click the link to transfer the funds.
Hey I found a funny picture of you online. You should really check this out: [suspicious link].
Hi it's Sarah from support. We need to verify your account credentials for security reasons. Please respond with your password.
Your friend Anna sent you a special message. Click here to view it: [phishing link].

Hey just checking in to see if you're free for lunch tomorrow. Let me know!
Please find attached the agenda for our upcoming meeting. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions.

Here's the recipe I mentioned earlier. I hope you enjoy making it!

Just wanted to say thank you for your help today. It was much appreciated.
Please let me know if there's anything else I can do for you. I'm happy to help.
